DESCRIPTION: Using #yElasticity can enhance the abilities of a Rubber Human.
Can be obtained through different [Food]. Heal 1 HP at the end of the turn.
Every 2 stacks of Armament Haki increase attack damage and block by 1 points.
Gain block at the end of each turn.
Rubber attack cards deal an additional instance of damage.
Giant cards cost 2 less energy, and Elasticity consumption is reduced by 50%.
Take damage and return equal damage to the attacker.
Good companions on Luffy's adventurous journey.
